channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: To Many Ukrainians, U.S. Peace Plan Looks Like ‘Capitulation’
item.description: While the White House has cautioned that the proposal is still in “flux,” its contours reflect maximalist demands made by Russia throughout the war th...

item.title: Can vaping help wean people off cigarettes? Anti-smoking advocates are sharply split
item.description: Many think it's a dangerous ploy by the tobacco industry. But some say, with millions of deaths each year attributed to smoking cigarettes, it's the l...

item.title: A new Miss Universe is crowned, weeks after she left a pageant event in protest
item.description: This year's Miss Universe competition, held in Bangkok, was marred by a series of dramatic incidents, from a contestant's livestreamed walkout to a no...

item.title: As Trump Pushes on Russia-Ukraine Peace Plan, Zelensky’s Options Are Narrowing
item.description: The Ukrainian president’s options are narrowing as he is confronted with a 28-point proposal drafted by American and Russian envoys.

item.title: Putin says U.S. plan for Ukraine could form the basis for a final peace settlement
item.description: The plan includes many of Russian President Vladimir Putin's demands. Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said Friday that his country is at "trul...

item.title: America Is Setting a Trap for Itself
item.description: The United States, not China, seems determined to upend the global order.

item.title: The Fate of Google’s Ad Tech Monopoly Is Now in a Judge’s Hands
item.description: A judge queried lawyers about whether a breakup made sense during closing arguments on how to fix the tech giant’s dominance in online advertising.

item.title: The female crash test dummy has been a long time coming — but she isn't here yet
item.description: After years of limbo, the U.S. government has given the green light to a crash test dummy based on the female body. But will it be used right away? No...

item.title: South Africa hosts G20 as tensions with U.S. flare amid boycott
item.description: The U.S. boycotts South Africa's G20 summit, sparking a diplomatic spat and throwing the global gathering into turmoil.

item.title: European Leaders Back Zelensky After Trump’s Russia-Ukraine Peace Plan Excludes Them
item.description: A U.S.-Russian proposal would require Kyiv to give up territory and reduce its army. If Moscow complies with the terms, it could receive benefits incl...

item.title: Survivors Describe Deadly Snowstorm in Chilean Patagonia
item.description: Five tourists, from Mexico, Britain and Germany, died Monday on a popular hiking trail in the Torres del Paine National Park.
